title: Smoked bacon and lentil soup
ingredients: ['1 tbsp olive oil', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '2 lean smoked back bacon rashers, chopped', '1 large onion, chopped', '2 carrots, peeled and diced', '½ large swede, peeled and diced', '1 litre chicken or vegetable stock', '125g green lentils', 'grated zest of 1 lemon', '4 parsnips, peeled and diced', '2–3 tbsp chopped fresh parsley']
